price: 20.Nabiyow kok naharat ni- farmoytiitik num maruubinnino, diggah usun seehaday maaqo takmeeh sookittel gexa marah anuk ken Rubne nee akke waytek, kaadu sinaamey garu gari mokkoro (aqayyaare) siinik abnek tasbireenih innaa? isbira Yalli waajib siinil abeemil, Nabiyow ku- Rabbi yabali kinni yasbire mara kee asbirewaa mara.
arabic: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا قَبۡلَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ إِلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ لَيَأۡكُلُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَيَمۡشُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَسۡوَاقِۗ وَجَعَلۡنَا بَعۡضَكُمۡ لِبَعۡضٖ فِتۡنَةً أَتَصۡبِرُونَۗ وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ بَصِيرٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā arsalnā qablaka mina al-mur'salīna illā innahum layakulūna al-ṭaʿāma wayamshūna fī al-aswāqi wajaʿalnā baʿḍakum libaʿḍin fit'natan ataṣbirūna wakāna rabbuka baṣīran
